nodes.text: Bellarius Drade was a male Dark Side Adept assigned to protect and monitor the Imperial Precipitator Minas-Coth Cray. While on the mission, Drade sensed the presence of a Force-sensitive child, named Djinn Kylo, and he took the boy as his apprentice, hoping to create his own splinter group.
Although only referred to as a Dark Side Adept, he was also known to possess a lightsaber, perhaps denoting him as a Dark Jedi.
